fields.title: Switch to flotr2 graphs from GoogleCharts
fields.body: There are many installations that would like to have the graphing that Gitblit offers, but do not want to rely on or can not permit calls by the client browsers to Google's Charting services.  For this reason we need to switch to a self-hosted charting library and [flotr2](http://humblesoftware.com/flotr2/) is a good candidate for this change.
